name: bulk_delete_components
description: Delete multiple components at once. Useful for clearing slots, removing related components, or cleanup operations. Each component is removed from its slot and optionally cleaned up from context bus.

componentIds.description: Array of module IDs to delete

animate.description: Play exit animations (default: false for better performance)

cleanupContext.description: Cleanup components from context bus (default: true)

stopOnError.description: Stop deleting if any deletion fails (default: false - continues on errors)
